listitem.para: Moves the turtle to an absolute X,Y,Z coordinate. The argument is a list of three numbers, the X, Y and Z coordinates. This command is designed to run in PERSPECTIVE mode. See also POSXYZ.

programlisting.userinput: ; draw a cube CLEARSCREEN PERSPECTIVE SETPOSXYZ [0 100 0] SETPOSXYZ [100 100 0] SETPOSXYZ [100 0 0] SETPOSXYZ [0 0 0] SETPOSXYZ [0 0 100] SETPOSXYZ [100 0 100] SETPOSXYZ [100 100 100] SETPOSXYZ [0 100 100] SETPOSXYZ [0 0 100] SETPOSXYZ [0 100 100] SETPOSXYZ [0 100 0] SETPOSXYZ [100 100 0] SETPOSXYZ [100 100 100] SETPOSXYZ [100 0 100] SETPOSXYZ [100 0 0]
